Comment:
There are 519,000 elected politicians in the USA at all levels of government. At all levels of government, approximately how many elected politicians are there worldwide? A lower/upper bound would be acceptable. The estimate involves applying the USA's per-capita number to the world: 7 billion/330 million * 519,000 = 11 million

So the CCP found 20 Politicians out of the millions in the world that would speak nicely about the CCP Games.
